attributes.action: stop the mp expense system and bring it to line like the rest of us have to live.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £150k per year is too much for MP's particularly when the rest of us are struglling with food, and fuel prices rocketing. It would be good for the MP's to come back to the real world and look at the state us normal people are in. We pay for fuel out of our pockets, they claim for theirs out of our pockets too! via the parliment expenses system. Therefore we want them to abolish the current system and live like the rest of us in other types of work.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
